title: Teardrops From Cloud Nine
description: A compilation of original verse and poetry depicting a lifetime of desire, fear, loss, imagination, passion and triumph. Teardrops From Cloud Nine , ranging from amateurish to borderline genius, will tug at any heart while potentially moistening the eye of the beholder."Brace yourself for an imaginative journey.""Poignantâ€¦ and Provocative""An eruption of deeply emotional experiences."Teardrops From Cloud Nine showcases nearly four decades of intimate expressions woven into the delicate fabric of a creative tapestry on the wall of one man's life.
author: Michael P. Clutton
